thread.title: Trump signs tariffs amid widespread condemnation

title: Trump signs tariffs amid widespread condemnation
text:
Trump signs tariffs amid widespread condemnation Thursday, March 08, 2018 - 02:20 
President Trump set new tariffs on steel and aluminum imports but exempted Canada and Mexico, in a move that was softer than he previously projected, but still sparked outrage within his party and among trading partners.
